history.content:
Arrow Capital is excited to announce that Investment Partner applications are now open! We are recruiting 3-4 smart, motivated and entrepreneurial Cal students to join our team from Fall 2019 and beyond.

Arrow is student powered venture fund investing up to $50k in Berkeley affiliated startups, which is backed by Bow Capital and the UC Endowment. For more information on this unique opportunity, see here: https://tinyurl.com/ArrowJobSpec

Apply early as interviews will be conducted on a rolling basis (applications close on Friday, May 3 at 11:59pm PST).

Apply Now! https://www.arrow.capital/join-our-team
history.subject: Arrow Capital Recruitment

history.content:

We will be recruiting 3-4 smart, motivated and entrepreneurial Cal students to join our team from next academic year and beyond. Apply early as interviews will be conducted on a rolling basis (applications close on Friday, May 3 at 11:59pm PST).

For more information on this unique opportunity, see here: https://tinyurl.com/ArrowJobSpec
